verses.kjv: Now Benjamin begat Bela his firstborn, Ashbel the second, and Aharah the third,
verses.web: Benjamin became the father of Bela his firstborn, Ashbel the second, Aharah the third,
verses.ct: Benjamin had 5 sons. His firstborn was Bela, his 2nd was Ashbel, and his 3rd was Aharah.

verses.kjv: Nohah the fourth, and Rapha the fifth.
verses.web: Nohah the fourth, and Rapha the fifth.
verses.ct: His 4th son was Nohah, and his 5th was Rapha.

verses.kjv: And the sons of Bela were, Addar, and Gera, and Abihud,
verses.web: Bela had sons: Addar, Gera, Abihud,
verses.ct: Bela's sons were Addar, Gera, Abihud,

verses.kjv: And Abishua, and Naaman, and Ahoah,
verses.web: Abishua, Naaman, Ahoah,
verses.ct: Abishua, Naaman, Ahoah,

verses.kjv: And Gera, and Shephuphan, and Huram.
verses.web: Gera, Shephuphan, and Huram.
verses.ct: Gera, Shephuphan, and Huram.

verses.kjv: And these are the sons of Ehud: these are the heads of the fathers of the inhabitants of Geba, and they removed them to Manahath:
verses.web: These are the sons of Ehud. These are the heads of fathers’ households of the inhabitants of Geba, who were carried captive to Manahath:
verses.ct: These were the sons of Ehud. They were the leaders of the families living in Geba, but they were forced to relocate to Manahath:

verses.kjv: And Naaman, and Ahiah, and Gera, he removed them, and begat Uzza, and Ahihud.
verses.web: Naaman, Ahijah, and Gera, who carried them captive; and he became the father of Uzza and Ahihud.
verses.ct: Naaman, Ahiah, and Gera — he led them into exile. Gera also became the father of Uzza and Ahihud.

verses.kjv: And Shaharaim begat children in the country of Moab, after he had sent them away; Hushim and Baara were his wives.
verses.web: Shaharaim became the father of children in the field of Moab, after he had sent them away. Hushim and Baara were his wives.
verses.ct: Shaharaim had children in the land of Moab after he divorced his wives Hushim and Baara.

verses.kjv: And he begat of Hodesh his wife, Jobab, and Zibia, and Mesha, and Malcham,
verses.web: By Hodesh his wife, he became the father of Jobab, Zibia, Mesha, Malcam,
verses.ct: Through his wife Hodesh, he became the father of Jobab, Zibia, Mesha, Malcham,

verses.kjv: And Jeuz, and Shachia, and Mirma. These were his sons, heads of the fathers.
verses.web: Jeuz, Shachia, and Mirmah. These were his sons, heads of fathers’ households.
verses.ct: Jeuz, Shachia, and Mirma. These sons all became heads of their families.

verses.kjv: And of Hushim he begat Abitub, and Elpaal.
verses.web: By Hushim, he became the father of Abitub and Elpaal.
verses.ct: Through Hushim, he had already fathered Abitub and Elpaal.

verses.kjv: The sons of Elpaal; Eber, and Misham, and Shamed, who built Ono, and Lod, with the towns thereof:
verses.web: The sons of Elpaal: Eber, Misham, and Shemed, who built Ono and Lod, with its towns;
verses.ct: Elpaal's sons were Eber, Misham, and Shamed. Shamed built the towns of Ono and Lod, along with their surrounding villages.

verses.kjv: Beriah also, and Shema, who were heads of the fathers of the inhabitants of Aijalon, who drove away the inhabitants of Gath:
verses.web: and Beriah, and Shema, who were heads of fathers’ households of the inhabitants of Aijalon, who put to flight the inhabitants of Gath;
verses.ct: Beriah and Shema were also his sons. They became leaders of the families living in Aijalon and drove out the people of Gath.

verses.kjv: And Ahio, Shashak, and Jeremoth,
verses.web: and Ahio, Shashak, Jeremoth,
verses.ct: Ahio, Shashak, and Jeremoth,

verses.kjv: And Zebadiah, and Arad, and Ader,
verses.web: Zebadiah, Arad, Eder,
verses.ct: Zebadiah, Arad, and Ader,

verses.kjv: And Michael, and Ispah, and Joha, the sons of Beriah;
verses.web: Michael, Ishpah, Joha, the sons of Beriah,
verses.ct: Michael, Ispah, and Joha were the sons of Beriah.

verses.kjv: And Zebadiah, and Meshullam, and Hezeki, and Heber,
verses.web: Zebadiah, Meshullam, Hizki, Heber,
verses.ct: Zebadiah, Meshullam, Hezeki, Heber,

verses.kjv: Ishmerai also, and Jezliah, and Jobab, the sons of Elpaal;
verses.web: Ishmerai, Izliah, Jobab, the sons of Elpaal,
verses.ct: Ishmerai, Jezliah, and Jobab were the sons of Elpaal.

verses.kjv: And Jakim, and Zichri, and Zabdi,
verses.web: Jakim, Zichri, Zabdi,
verses.ct: Jakim, Zichri, Zabdi,

verses.kjv: And Elienai, and Zilthai, and Eliel,
verses.web: Elienai, Zillethai, Eliel,
verses.ct: Elienai, Zilthai, Eliel,

verses.kjv: And Adaiah, and Beraiah, and Shimrath, the sons of Shimhi;
verses.web: Adaiah, Beraiah, Shimrath, the sons of Shimei,
verses.ct: Adaiah, Beraiah, and Shimrath were the sons of Shimhi.

verses.kjv: And Ishpan, and Heber, and Eliel,
verses.web: Ishpan, Eber, Eliel,
verses.ct: Ishpan, Heber, Eliel,

verses.kjv: And Abdon, and Zichri, and Hanan,
verses.web: Abdon, Zichri, Hanan,
verses.ct: Abdon, Zichri, Hanan,

verses.kjv: And Hananiah, and Elam, and Antothijah,
verses.web: Hananiah, Elam, Anthothijah,
verses.ct: Hananiah, Elam, Antothijah,

verses.kjv: And Iphedeiah, and Penuel, the sons of Shashak;
verses.web: Iphdeiah, Penuel, the sons of Shashak,
verses.ct: Iphedeiah, and Penuel were the sons of Shashak.

verses.kjv: And Shamsherai, and Shehariah, and Athaliah,
verses.web: Shamsherai, Shehariah, Athaliah,
verses.ct: Shamsherai, Shehariah, Athaliah,

verses.kjv: And Jaresiah, and Eliah, and Zichri, the sons of Jeroham.
verses.web: Jaareshiah, Elijah, Zichri, and the sons of Jeroham.
verses.ct: Jaresiah, Eliah, and Zichri were the sons of Jeroham.

verses.kjv: These were heads of the fathers, by their generations, chief men. These dwelt in Jerusalem.
verses.web: These were heads of fathers’ households throughout their generations, chief men. These lived in Jerusalem.
verses.ct: All of these men were leaders of their families, listed by their generations as prominent chiefs. They lived in Jerusalem.

verses.kjv: And at Gibeon dwelt the father of Gibeon; whose wife’s name was Maachah:
verses.web: The father of Gibeon, whose wife’s name was Maacah, lived in Gibeon,
verses.ct: The founder of Gibeon lived in Gibeon. His wife's name was Maachah.

verses.kjv: And his firstborn son Abdon, and Zur, and Kish, and Baal, and Nadab,
verses.web: with his firstborn son Abdon, Zur, Kish, Baal, Nadab,
verses.ct: His firstborn son was Abdon, followed by Zur, Kish, Baal, Nadab,

verses.kjv: And Gedor, and Ahio, and Zacher.
verses.web: Gedor, Ahio, and Zecher.
verses.ct: Gedor, Ahio, and Zacher.

verses.kjv: And Mikloth begat Shimeah. And these also dwelt with their brethren in Jerusalem, over against them.
verses.web: Mikloth became the father of Shimeah. They also lived with their brothers in Jerusalem, near their brothers.
verses.ct: Mikloth was the father of Shimeah. These families also lived in Jerusalem, near their relatives.

verses.kjv: And Ner begat Kish, and Kish begat Saul, and Saul begat Jonathan, and Malchishua, and Abinadab, and Eshbaal.
verses.web: Ner became the father of Kish. Kish became the father of Saul. Saul became the father of Jonathan, Malchishua, Abinadab, and Eshbaal.
verses.ct: Ner was the father of Kish. Kish was the father of Saul. Saul was the father of Jonathan, Malchishua, Abinadab, and Eshbaal.

verses.kjv: And the son of Jonathan was Meribbaal; and Meribbaal begat Micah.
verses.web: The son of Jonathan was Merib Baal. Merib Baal became the father of Micah.
verses.ct: Jonathan's son was Meribbaal, and Meribbaal was the father of Micah.

verses.kjv: And the sons of Micah were, Pithon, and Melech, and Tarea, and Ahaz.
verses.web: The sons of Micah: Pithon, Melech, Tarea, and Ahaz.
verses.ct: Micah's sons were Pithon, Melech, Tarea, and Ahaz.

verses.kjv: And Ahaz begat Jehoadah; and Jehoadah begat Alemeth, and Azmaveth, and Zimri; and Zimri begat Moza,
verses.web: Ahaz became the father of Jehoaddah. Jehoaddah became the father of Alemeth, Azmaveth, and Zimri. Zimri became the father of Moza.
verses.ct: Ahaz was the father of Jehoadah. Jehoadah was the father of Alemeth, Azmaveth, and Zimri. Zimri was the father of Moza.

verses.kjv: And Moza begat Binea: Rapha was his son, Eleasah his son, Azel his son:
verses.web: Moza became the father of Binea. Raphah was his son, Eleasah his son, and Azel his son.
verses.ct: Moza was the father of Binea. After Binea came Rapha, then Eleasah, then Azel.

verses.kjv: And Azel had six sons, whose names are these, Azrikam, Bocheru, and Ishmael, and Sheariah, and Obadiah, and Hanan. All these were the sons of Azel.
verses.web: Azel had six sons, whose names are these: Azrikam, Bocheru, Ishmael, Sheariah, Obadiah, and Hanan. All these were the sons of Azel.
verses.ct: Azel had 6 sons: Azrikam, Bocheru, Ishmael, Sheariah, Obadiah, and Hanan. All of these were Azel's sons.

verses.kjv: And the sons of Eshek his brother were, Ulam his firstborn, Jehush the second, and Eliphelet the third.
verses.web: The sons of Eshek his brother: Ulam his firstborn, Jeush the second, and Eliphelet the third.
verses.ct: His brother Eshek had sons as well: Ulam was his firstborn, Jehush was 2nd, and Eliphelet was 3rd.

verses.kjv: And the sons of Ulam were mighty men of valour, archers, and had many sons, and sons’ sons, an hundred and fifty. All these are of the sons of Benjamin.
verses.web: The sons of Ulam were mighty men of valor, archers, and had many sons, and sons’ sons, one hundred fifty. All these were of the sons of Benjamin.
verses.ct: Ulam's descendants were fierce warriors and expert archers. They had many sons and grandsons — 150 in all. All of these belonged to the tribe of Benjamin.
